title: Fix what you made before you make more.
body:
1. Some inputs in game occasionally not registering (spam mouse clicks etc)

2. Random participants in every game will experience ping fluctuations

3. Tower aggro does not work correctly (will occasionally switch minion targets etc)

4. Many users cannot log in until trying 5-6 times to hit a "sweet spot" in the connection

5. Leaving a custom game results in a leaverbuster queue and penalty.

6. Clientside crashes forcing you to close client result in loss of LP and series games. 

Post whatever else is currently not working correctly in LoL, client and gameside, so they will understand the sheer magnitude of non-working systems that we are having to deal with.

You're the one letting them piss you off. There are shitty people in the interwebs. They're called "trolls". There are unskilled gamers on league. They're called "people who are learning a game". Until they've explicitly said they're trolling, you should assume otherwise. Flaming someone who is honestly trying their best is nothing to be proud of, even if they're doing badly. 

For example, I played a game as Warwick just now (on my smurf Infamnia). We had a Kalista, Renekton, Volibear, and Viktor. The Kalista disconnected 3 minutes in, which led to the support Volibear feeding Jinx and Leona. The Viktor also started giving Zed kills after Zed reached six. Now, if you simply assumed that because our voli was 0/8, he sucked, and you flamed him, then he probably would lose hope and start doing even more stupid things. 
I chose the route of constructive criticism, being constantly positive, and trying to help. Aaaaaand I may have carried a little, 17/5/21.  BUT! If you chose to try to flame and carry, nobody will listen to your pings. They'll mute you, so when you tell them to do something they see nothing. Why? Because you're being an asshole to them. If you try something like being positive, it feels a lot better than raging in a game, and if you give the proper advice (protect Viktor and dive on the Jinx and Zed in the previously mentioned case) you can win 4v5s.
